body.name: Sunvivi Roaster Oven, 20 Quart Electric Roaster Oven with Self-Basting Lid, Turkey Roaster Oven Buffet with Removable Pan, Cool-Touch Handles, Black
features: 【Large Electric Roaster Oven】- Perfect family size roaster oven fits a turkey up to 24 pounds, Large capacity is ideal for preparing holiday dinners and for entertaining, providing extra cook space along with versatile cooking options for roasting, baking and slow cooking.

【Powerful Cooking Function】- 150°F to 450°F 1450W Full-range temperature control with Self-Basting lid continuously circulates the water, can make the turkey fully absorb the soup and make it more delicious. Use the liner at temperatures below 350F and with water to avoid sticking the liner to the pan.

【Warming Setting】- Warming setting keeps dinner at ideal serving temperature. Don’t worry about preparing food too early to make the food cold. Sunvivi electric roaster oven- essential kitchen supplies for large gatherings, allowing family and friends to enjoy the best flavored food, making the gathering more warm and enthusiastic.

【Convenient Visible Lid Design】- The unique Visible lid of the Sunvivi electric roaster oven, reduce the need to open the lid during cooking.Reduce the risk of being scalded by superheated steam,and keeps the turkey from contact with the air, maintains a constant temperature, and cooks with a great taste.
【Anti-Scald & Easy to Clean】- Cool-Touch handles on the lid and body, can protect your hands.Includes removable enamel-on-steel roasting pan for fast, even heat distribution and easy clean-up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Cake 2 Meat 3 Soup 4 Sauce

Elevate Your Party Cooking Experience Make your gatherings tastier and more vibrant than ever! Our versatile roasting oven is your indispensable companion for parties. It not only delivers perfect roasted chicken but also effortlessly crafts various delicacies such as grilled steaks, roasted vegetables, and desserts. Gift your family and friends a delightful feast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as Described- HUGE
reviews.reviewText: This thing is huge. If you are cooking for a crowd, this is for you. We use it to bake potatoes for a small restaurant. It is used everyday to cook potatoes and then keep them warm. It does a great job. We have never used it for anything beyond that, but I’m sure it would work well for large meats too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moist & Succulent Dishes!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for Thanksgiving dinner, since I’m usually the person in my family to cook a feast! 😊Traditionally, I have always followed the basic traditional method of Turkey in baking pans, basing etc. On some years my turkey would either run a bit dry or just right. 🥺 I thought it was time to invest in one and boy, I am glad! I’ll admit, I was skeptical in what it could do.Pros:• easy to clean (I do see that after a session of Turkey cooking there was some slight build up, but nothing some good old scrubbing won’t fix)• kept turkey meat moist, crispy on the outside and browned evenly• a nice holder to prop the turkey up and add your garnishes and herbs to the bottom• plenty of recipes online to help utilize your oven with measurements etc• cooking time was relatively faster than traditional cooking for me• heat was evenly distributed and conducted well• design is sleek and fitting• holds up to a large Turkey of 26lbs• you place your choice of meat and walk away to multitask on other dishes/sides• nice little glass window opening to peep in on your cooked mealCons:• a little bulky for some (but I wanted something that was large to feed a family of over 8 people)• finding kitchen or storage place for it (luckily I have space in my garage)Overall, I was able to make delicious turkey. I made a 22lbs turkey that feed 14-15 people. This electric toaster oven made it possible for me to finish all my sides. I skipped all the parts of basing and worrying about the turkey being moist and supple. My family members and friends also raved about the turkey and I told them to invest in one of these. You could not go wrong with one of these in your kitchen especially if you usually cook for a larger crowd. I love my new roaster oven and will never go back to traditional methods. This oven will also be great for roasting brisket and any other slower cooked methods, which I will be trying out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turkey Day Stove Saver
reviews.reviewText: Having this saved me time and money on Thanksgiving! It freed up my stove so I could focus on the side dishes and saved me money because I didn't have to buy peanut oil for a turkey fryer! It cooked my turkey to perfection and was so juicy! It is sooooo easy to clean. This is the perfect addition to any kitchen!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turkey Dinner a Success
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous to try "something new" at our big dinner but needed extra oven space and gave it a go. it DOES brown and crisp the skin! It also cooks SUPER FAST! Our turkey went in around 9:20 am and was done before 11:30 am. I had calculated 3 hrs so Dinner wasn't until 1pm so had it turned off then on warming to keep it from cooking too long or getting cold etc. In spite of all that, at 1:15 pm we carved the turkey and it was still good! Nothing dried out at all. Perfectly done. I did use a wired thermometer to keep tabs on the temp and that let us know the bird was actually done way ahead of schedule. It was accurate. We even turned the heat down from 325 to 300 to slow the process down a bit.So the key here is to PRE HEAT as high as it will go and keep it there while dressing the bird. Carefully put it in (husband did this part) and close the lid and DO NOT OPEN IT for at least an hour or more. The window was clear and you could see it fine. I think if you open it too soon you will not get the browned skin effect. It was reading 'done' on the thermometer less than an hour and half in and the bird was already browned. We had to make sure it was actually done so we opened it. Glad we did check because it was done alright. Note: I had separated the skin to put butter under it so during the cooking, half of the breast skin pulled away because I over stretched it. Otherwise it is definitely nicely browned. This was a good purchase. Looking forward to try Prim Rib Roast and other meats!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: easy to get food in and out. Cleanup was fast. One 15lb turkey fit with lots of room. Could probably fit 18lb to 20lb bird.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good option for the price
reviews.reviewText: The unit arrived on time with good packaging and no visible damage. I have owned a roaster before, so I have reasonable expectations. First, it is extremely light weight, which can be good as these are large and can be hard to move and store. Though I ordered and received the item labeled 24 qt, which should technically be larger than my old 21 qt, it "seems" smaller. It is narrower, but with the domed lid it is taller. I do hope I can roast a 24/25 lb. turkey. I will update after Thanksgiving! The worst issue might be a deal breaker for others, but I am going to live with it -- The black inner liner has some bent/rough/sharp edges where it meets the main unit. This is not the removable inner cooking pan, but the permanent cooking shell that the pan sits in. I've attached a couple of pics, but it is really hard to see. I did get a small cut when taking it out of the box the first time. Was quite startling! But, it took me a bit to figure out how it happened. Just not great workmanship.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful roaster and I love that it’s easy to use, easy to clean and it holds about 40 pounds of food. It is perfect for us as we are small homesteaders and I process a lot of food at one time for canning and freezing, etc. highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have only use it a couple of times, but so far it is very well liked. We got the red which was just as important as the function. As we use a roaster several times a month the size is why we ordered it and the glass see thru on the top is bigger than expected. The fact that it can be turned off, where most roasters just turn to warm was another selling point. We used our last roaster for many years and expect to use this one just as long.
